Articles.Content: Hi, I'm new to the forums(obviously!)and I just decided that I would say hi. I hope to make some addons in the future, and i have a KSP mod review blog here:http://kerbmodreviews.wordpress.com I seem to be a complete idiot and don't know how to make a sgnature, or I'd put the link there!

Hi I'm new as well, I think you can set your signature and avatar after a certain amount of post proving you're not a a-hole...

I don't know the amount but since I'm new here but not new to forum ethics.

some comments on your WP:

The Kerbal Mod Analyst

~ Thanks for visiting my site! Here I will be trying out mods for KSP and reviewing them for the general people.

I think the title says it all but you might want to think about dropping the general people of that sentence.

Pick a font (I prefer a sans-serif) but don't mix fonts styles I looks messy.

Also make a nice header img and try tweaking of different types of WP layouts that makes you distinct and still reads well.

Here is an other tip I heard videos doe really well on the internet...
